Html: Is is possible to highlight the entire row and not just the cell?
I believe the default style does highlight the entire row when selecting a cell. If you run the ModernUI demo app, and navigate to controls > styles > datagrid, selecting a cell does select the row.
I should have been more clear. I mean highlight the whole row on hover and not just the cell. There is full row highlight on select.
Ah okay, an update of the DataGrid style has been checked in that does a highlight of the full row. You'll need to get the latest sources to check it out.
